opendial.gui.stateviewer

Class DistributionViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • opendial.gui.stateviewer.DistributionViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class DistributionViewer
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    GUI window displaying a (discrete or continuous) distribution as a chart. The graphical layout of the chart is based on JFreeChart.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-10-31 00:04:31 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
